name: Mini Archer
description:
Are you good at aiming things?


Are you good at archery?



Regardless of the answer, this casual game is for you !

Mini Archer is a simple game with easily understandable game-mechanics and has a unique game-play experience . Pull back the arrow from the bow and pierce it into the target. Shoot arrows in the middle of the target and gain coins for unlocking characters in the store, there are many characters to choose from.

Mini Archer is a casual game made for all type of audience mainly focusing on casual gaming community.

Precise every shot with your aiming skills and get listed in the top of the leaderboard.

FEATURES:
* Easy and playable gameplay mechanic.

* Inspired from many archery games.
* Has a unique set of 45 characters to be unlocked.
* Parallax nature background changes its tint for each level.
* This game is targeted for casual game audience of all ages
